===Overview===
The '''Manhattan Project''' was a research and development project that produced the first nuclear weapons during [[World War II]]. It was led by the [[United States of America]] with the support of the [[United Kingdom]], [[Canada]] and the rest of the [[British Empire]]. 

===WWII===
Famed industrialist genius inventor; [[Howard Stark (Earth-616)|Howard Stark]] worked on various government projects. this included the Manhattan Project. The [[Johann Shmidt (Earth-616)|Red Skull]] abducted Howard and his then wife, and tortured him to gain information about the Manhattan Project. They were later rescued by [[Steven Rogers (Earth-616)|Captain America]] and the [[Howling Commandos (WWII) (Earth-616)|Howling Commandos]].{{r|Captain America Annual #9}}

The project culminated in several atomic devices, one of which was used in the first nuclear test near [[Alamogordo]], [[New Mexico (State)|New Mexico]], on July 16, 1945.{{r|Torch Vol 1 1}} The other two were weapons, were used in the [[Atomic Bombings of Hiroshima and Nagasaki]].{{r|Marvel Atlas Vol 1 1}}
